title: Really annoying Ashe bug!!!
body: Often when ashe is in a game, no matter where you are or what team ashe is on, you can always hear her volley spell being cast, its like a global sound effect, she can be in bot and ill be top or mid and still hear it plain as day, its sooooo annoying after a while just hearing disembodied sounds...

replies.body: Yeah, I hear this all game when an {{champion:22}}  is on our team. Its so bloody annoying.
i have gotten to the point where i just cant stand it anymore, i have to turn the sound down really low, which in turn affects gameplay.
